      • checkCall

        public boolean checkCall(java.lang.String username,
                         int iCartella,
                         CallEnum call)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Check if the winning call(ambo,terna, ecc..) from a player is right
        Parameters:
        username - the name of the player
        iCartella - index of the card
        call - type of the call
        Returns:
        true if the call is right; false if the call is wrong
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • findPlayer

        private int findPlayer(java.lang.String username)
        Search a player in the session
        Parameters:
        username - of the searched player
        Returns:
        the index of the player in the Arraylist of the players of the session, if there is that player in the session -1, if there isn't that player in the session

        Returns:
